project4.title: Nautilus Explorer
project4.description: Team project that required each individual to create a single page using firebase hosting. 3 of the pages share data to pass information into the respective fields.
project4.techUsed: This project invovled: HTML5, Sass, Bootstrap, Jquery, ES6 Modules, Webpack, Moment.js, Firebase and JAVASCRIPT
